statements: SELECT * FROM energy_monitoring WHERE hotel_id = 1;
SELECT energy_usage FROM energy_monitoring WHERE sustainability_initiatives LIKE '%solar%';
SELECT hotel_id, sustainability_initiatives FROM energy_monitoring WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT sustainability_initiatives, energy_usage FROM energy_monitoring ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sustainability_initiatives FROM energy_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM energy_monitoring WHERE hotel_id = 1;
SELECT hotel_id, energy_usage FROM energy_monitoring WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT hotel_id, energy_usage, sustainability_initiatives FROM energy_monitoring WHERE sustainability_initiatives LIKE '%solar%';
SELECT * FROM energy_monitoring WHERE hotel_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT hotel_id, energy_usage, sustainability_initiatives FROM energy_monitoring ORDER BY energy_usage DESC, hotel_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage;
SELECT room_number, electricity_usage FROM energy_usage WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT initiative_name, implementation_date FROM sustainability_initiatives;
SELECT room_number, electricity_usage, water_usage FROM energy_usage WHERE electricity_usage > 100;
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT id, electricity_usage FROM energy_usage WHERE electricity_usage > 100;
SELECT id, initiative_name FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(initiative_name) < 20;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE electricity_usage > water_usage;
SELECT initiative_name, implementation_date FROM sustainability_initiatives ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage;
SELECT room_number, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM energy_usage WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT * FROM hotel_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT id, initiative_name, start_date FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, description FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT room_number, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage ORDER BY room_number DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT room_number, AVG(energy_consumed) AS average_consumption FROM energy_usage GROUP BY room_number HAVING AVG(energy_consumed) > 100;
SELECT id, initiative_name, description FROM sustainability_initiatives ORDER BY id ASC, initiative_name DESC;
SELECT room_number, MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM hotel_ratings GROUP BY room_number;
SELECT * FROM hotel_rooms;
SELECT room_number, room_type FROM hotel_rooms WHERE status='occupied';
SELECT consumption_id, consumption_value, timestamp FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, description FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT meter_id, meter_reading FROM energy_metering WHERE meter_reading < 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_metering;
SELECT room_number, meter_reading FROM energy_metering ORDER BY room_number DESC;
SELECT meter_id, timestamp FROM energy_metering WHERE meter_reading > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT initiative_name, description FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100 ORDER BY initiative_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage;
SELECT id, room_number, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT room_number, COUNT(id) AS total_entries FROM energy_usage GROUP BY room_number;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_initiatives WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT room_number, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC;
SELECT e.id, e.name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_name WHERE e.job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT r.room_number, r.room_type, r.floor_number, s.initiative_name FROM hotel_rooms r LEFT JOIN sustainability_initiatives s ON r.room_number = s.id;
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed, MIN(energy_consumed) AS min_energy_consumed FROM energy_usage;
